channel.title: Gateway warn tor setup is changed
channel.description:
I find this error when I use Gateway : the torrc differs from what tor's using . You can issue a sighup to reload the torrc value by pressing x . Configuration value is missing from the torrc : RunAsDaemon . I see every times this warn since I updated to Whonix 11 .
I don't know what it means or what I should do . Excuse me if it's a trivial question .

item.title: Gateway warn tor setup is changed
item.dc:creator: Hiberts
item.description:
Thanks , infact all runs correctly .

Read full topic
item.source: Gateway warn tor setup is changed
